alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Washington Parish in southeastern Louisiana and west central Pearl River Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mcneil, or 10 miles southwest of Poplarville, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bogalusa, Varnado, Crossroads and Mcneil. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 14 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
